Smart-ID is the easiest, most convenient and safest way to authenticate yourself online – access bank accounts, e-services and sign transactions.

Smart-ID is currently available for:
-	Baltic States residents
-	Estonian e-residents


EASY 
Get started and download the Smart-ID app.
Follow the steps in the app to complete the registration process. Once you’ve done that, you’re good to go! 

CONVENIENT
Your Smart-ID is always within easy reach!
You can use Smart-ID in as many smart devices as you want and gain access to your online accounts any time, any place. Using Smart-ID is free and totally unlimited.

SAFE

Smart-ID app does not store your identity or PIN codes. The app is used for key management: it creates your private keys while performing account registration and later mediates authentication and signature requests. A technology has been used in this product for which Cybernetica AS has filed a patent application or a patent has been granted.

***
Smart-ID on kõige lihtsam, mugavam ja turvalisem viis enda tuvastamiseks internetis – vali nutikaim tee internetipanga ja e-teenuste kasutamiseks ning tehingute kinnitamiseks.

Smart-ID äppi saavad kasutada:
•	Balti riikide elanikud
•	Eesti e-residendid

LIHTNE
Alusta Smart-ID äpi allalaadimisest. 
Smart-ID konto registreerimiseks järgi juhiseid äpis. Kui see tehtud, oledki valmis Smart-IDd kasutama! 

MUGAV
Smart-ID on alati käeulatuses!
Smart-IDd saad kasutada nii mitmes seadmes, kui soovid, igal ajal ja igas kohas. Smart-ID kasutamine on tasuta ja piiramatu!

TURVALINE
Smart-ID äpis ei hoita sinu identiteeti ega PIN-koode. Äpp toimib info vahendajana – loob konto registreerimisel isiklikud võtmed ja hiljem vahendab päringuid e-teenustesse sisenemiseks ja toimingute allkirjastamiseks. Tootes on kasutatud tehnoloogiat, millele Cybernetica AS on esitanud patenditaotluse või on välja antud patent.

***

Smart-ID ir vienkāršākais, ērtākais un drošākais tiešsaistes autentifikācijas veids – piekļūsti internetbankas kontam, e-pakalpojumiem un apstiprini pārskaitījumus.

Smart-ID pašlaik ir pieejams:
•	Baltijas valstu iedzīvotājiem;
•	Igaunijas e-rezidentiem.

VIENKĀRŠI
Lejupielādē Smart-ID un sāc to lietot.
Izpildi norādītās darbības, lai apstiprinātu savu identitāti un pabeigtu reģistrāciju. Pēc tam lietotne būs gatava darbam!

ĒRTI
Tava Smart-ID vienmēr tuvumā!
Smart-ID lietotni vari izmantot neierobežotā skaitā ierīču, lai piekļūtu saviem tiešsaistes kontiem jebkurā laikā un vietā. Smart-ID izmantošana ir bez maksas un bez ierobežojumiem!

DROŠI
Smart-ID lietotne nesaglabā lietotāja identitāti vai PIN kodus. Lietotni izmanto atslēgu pārvaldībai. Tā izveido privātās atslēgas kontu reģistrācijas laikā un vēlāk darbojas kā starpniece autentifikācijas un paraksta pieprasījumu gadījumos. Produkts ietver tehnoloģiju, par kuru uzņēmums Cybernetica AS ir iesniedzis patenta pieteikumu vai ir izsniegts patents.


***

Smart-ID – tai lengvas, patogus ir saugus tapatybės patvirtinimo el. būdu įrankis, skirtas prisijungti prie banko sąskaitos, el. paslaugų ar patvirtinti veiksmus.

Smart-ID šiuo metu prieinamas:
•	Baltijos šalių gyventojams
•	Estijos e. rezidentams

PAPRASTA
Viskas, ko reikia, tai atsisiųsti Smart-ID programėlę
Užsiregistruokite vadovaudamiesi programėlės instrukcijomis ir patvirtinkite savo tapatybę. Tai padarius vieną kartą, bus galima naudotis!

PATOGU
Smart-ID visada lengvai pasiekiama!
Smart-ID galite naudoti keliuose išmaniuosiuose įrenginiuose bei prisijungti prie savo interneto paskyrų bet kur ir bet kuriuo metu. Naudojimasis Smart-ID yra nemokamas.

SAUGU
Smart-ID nesaugo jūsų asmens ar PIN kodų. Programėlė yra naudojama raktų valdymui: registruojant paskyrą, programėlė sukuria jūsų asmeninius raktus, kurie vėliau naudojami tapatybės nustatymui ir parašo patvirtinimui. Produkte naudojama technologija, kuriai Cybernetica AS pateikė paraišką patentui arba patentas jau yra išduotas.

Whether you’re working with teammates on a project or planning a weekend activity with loved ones, Microsoft Teams helps bring people together so that they can get things done. It’s the only app that has chats, meetings, files, tasks, and calendars in one place—so you can easily connect with people and bring plans to life. Get family and friends together to manage tasks at home or plan a surprise birthday party. Work with teammates via secure meetings, document collaboration, and built-in cloud storage. Easily connect with anyone: 
• Meet securely with teammates, family, and friends. Set up a video meeting within seconds and invite anyone by sharing a link or calendar invite.

• Video call anyone directly in Teams or instantly convert a group chat to video call.

Accomplish plans and projects together:

Designed to give you peace of mind:

A simple tool for businesses to talk to their customers. — WhatsApp Business from Meta

WhatsApp Business enables you to have a business presence on WhatsApp, communicate more efficiently with your customers, and help you grow your business.

If you have separate business and personal phone numbers, you can have both WhatsApp Business and WhatsApp Messenger installed on the same phone, and register them with different numbers.

In addition to the features available in WhatsApp Messenger, WhatsApp Business includes:

• BUSINESS PROFILE: Create a profile for your business to help your customers find valuable information — like your website, location, or contact information.

• BUSINESS MESSAGING TOOLS: Be more responsive to your customers by using Away messages to indicate that you're away.

• LANDLINE/FIXED NUMBER SUPPORT: You can use WhatsApp Business with a landline (or fixed) phone number and your customers can message you on that number. During verification, select the “Call me” option to receive the code over a phone call.

• RUN BOTH WHATSAPP MESSENGER AND WHATSAPP BUSINESS: You can use both WhatsApp Business and WhatsApp Messenger on the same phone, but each app must have its own unique phone number.

• WHATSAPP WEB: You can more efficiently respond to your customers right from your computer's browser.

WhatsApp Business is built on top of WhatsApp Messenger and includes all the features that you rely on, such as the ability to send multimedia, free calls*, free international messaging*, group chat, offline messages, and much more.

NOTE: Requires your carrier supports 3-way calling. SimpleTalk and H2o Wireless do NOT offer this in the US.

HOW TO RECORD OUTGOING CALLS:
1 – Press the RECORD button on the home screen of the app. Your phone will dial your local service number.
2 - Once connected to our recording number, tap the Add Call button on your screen to call your desired contact.
3 - Tap the Merge button to create a 3-way call between your existing call and our recording line.
4 – As soon as the conversation is finished, the recording will be available from within the app.

HOW TO RECORD INCOMING CALLS:
1 – Answer the incoming call.
2 – Press the Home Screen button and open the Call Recorder app.
3 – Tap on the Record button.  The existing call will be put on hold and your phone will dial your local service number.
4 – Once connected to the recording number, tap on the Merge Calls button to create a 3-way call between your existing call and our recording line.
5 – As soon as the conversation is finished, the recording will be available from within the app.

NOTE: Due to the secure way the iOS operating system works, it is not possible to automatically recording incoming or outgoing calls. The only way to record calls on iOS devices is to create a 3-way call with a recording number.

2. Numery PLU - do 1 artykułu przyporządkowanych jest 6 różnych numerów PLU - celem jest wybranie właściwego numeru PLU. 
- Gra - weryfikuje poziom wiedzy oraz szybkość wprowadzanych numerów PLU.

For Attendees

The Teamup iOS app helps teams get organized and stay in sync as a group across all your computers and mobile devices. It simplifies how teams communicate information, manage availability, schedule jobs and share events. With custom fields and document attachments, groups can capture, update, filter and share information in multiple dimensions. Through centralized calendar management and customizable access control (via browser), individuals get access to only what they need while managers may easily bring the silos together and keep the teams aligned in real-time. Use Teamup for free or upgrade options for larger groups.

To use the app, you need to have access to an existing Teamup Calendar. You can create your own calendar in a Web browser, add a link to an existing calendar, or be invited to an existing calendar as an account user. See a quick tutorial at https://www.teamup.com/apple.  

KEY FEATURES
•	Easily scalable for groups, teams, multiple resources or mulitple users
•	Instant sync with other users and across all your devices

•	Event filtering by keyword and custom field

•	Assign one event to multiple sub-calendars with striped display

Take Teamup iOS app with you and stay in sync with your team wherever you go.
